post.body: Nah, about what I want. Damned if I'm tellin' him though. (And stop eating cookie dough. Just wait for it to be cookies.)
Psh. Even if you told him the truth, he'd think you were being sarcastic.
Yeah, he's a dick like that. (Also he's going shopping again today to get me something, even though I don't want anything.)
As you should be. (Though I must warn that my penis turns gay women straight and gay men gayer. So don't look at it.)
Hardly. It is naught but MANLY stubble. (So manly that I have to keep chains on it or else it impregnates women!)
FAIL at paying attention. I trimmed it all off a while ago, missy. (Like, a week before the week of Finals.)
It is a MAN goatee. It can not be held back!
@wolfrend755 Psh, whatever guys. You don't appreciate goatees when they're right in front of you.
You first. You're wasting time worrying about me. (And more time talking to me.)
True, waste of a life is much more accurate.
That's no good. We can't have you worrying over such filth as I. Quit it. @wolfrend755 Thursday is Christmas. Dunno about Friday.
Just gotta get some Holiday Closure from Briana and I'm done for the year.
^_^ Can you tell that I'm feeling a bit better?
Dammit... I'm such a waste. My whole existence is unnecessary. Unneeded. Unwanted. Useless. Weak. "No one gives a shit. Shut up already."
With luck, someone will remove me soon. Maybe I'll end up somewhere better, you know? Gotta have optimism. ^_^
Go for it. I'm not even PRETENDING to help anymore. I could care less what you fucks waste your lives chasing. I'm done with that game.
"That sarcastic asshole," she thinks to herself, "no way I'm replying to this. Put this one into the ignore pile with the rest of 'em."
